name: Sustainable interior lighting design & new technologies
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session will examine the possibilities for reducing the environmental impact of lighting provision through a “big picture” approach. Through the use of combined technologies, reducing wasted light, and sustainable product design, the session will present case studies that demonstrate significant reductions in CO2 emissions and other environmental impacts beyond the use of energy efficient sources alone.

presentations.name: Sustainability and lighting: why lighting is important for 2016 targets
presentations.speakers: Fenella Frost, Marketing Communications Director, PhotonStar LED

presentations.name: Right light, right place, right time: what makes for good quality lighting design?
presentations.speakers: Liz Peck, Secretary, The Society of Light and Lighting

presentations.name: Off-grid, off-peak lighting and renewable energy: DC resilience case studies
presentations.speakers: Chris Wright, Co-founder and CTO, Moixa
